channel.title: Not Gaining Any XP at All - PI - Pics Included -
channel.description:
So I've been working on my server, adding little things here and there and today I decided to test a lot of things out by playing as a regular player and seeing what needs work.
But, first thing I do is train, and I'm not gaining any xp, and I cannot for the life of me figure out why...
If anyone has any idea, please let me know what classes to post or whatever, I'll cooperate any way I can. I just hope that I don't get called a noob for something simple :D Thanks!
Also, getting this error when I run the server - [IMG]http://puu.sh/1rGkG[/img]

item.title: Not Gaining Any XP at All - PI - Pics Included -
item.dc:creator: @WayneRsps WayneRsps
item.description:
@WayneRsps wrote:

Yeah if it were that I would’ve got it.

item.title: Not Gaining Any XP at All - PI - Pics Included -
item.dc:creator: @Nicksworld Nicksworld
item.description:
@Nicksworld wrote:

check your char file and make sure for that account it says
xpLock = false

help me with mine?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
